messages:
Name: Jure Balkovec
Nationality: Slovenia
Date of Birth: September 9, 1994
Position: Defender
Current club: Fatih Karagümrük
Süper Lig clubs played for: Fatih Karagümrük

Jure Balkovec, the Fatih Karagümrük defender, has taken part in the vast majority of the team's Süper Lig games in 2020/2021, making 33 appearances overall and playing 2,899 minutes. He has been selected in the starting XI in all 33 of these appearances across their 40 fixtures.

Balkovec last played in an Süper Lig match on May 11 for Fatih Karagümrük versus Beşiktaş. In that match the 26-year-old created one assist for his side in the side's 2-1 success. In total, the defender has scored two Süper Lig goals this term, and registered four assists. He has amassed six yellow cards, as well as sent off once.

Balkovec was last on target in the league in the 3-1 defeat against Antalyaspor on January 6, netting in the 10th minute. He opened his account for the campaign against Trabzonspor on January 3, scoring during a 2-1 loss.
Balkovec played 32 Serie B games last season for Empoli, scored one goal and provided six assists.
Prior to joining Fatih Karagümrük in September 2020, Balkovec made 18 league appearances in total at Hellas Verona.
